overview: Anthony Picozzi has over 20 years of water and waste water industry expertise. In addition to experience as a manufacturerâ€™s representative and as a contractor, he was a VP with US Filter focusing on National Accounts including CH2M Hill, one of the largest water and waste water engineering firms in the world. He joins us from Siemens where he was responsible for all Municipal Sales in North America including all disinfection equipment. Anthony has a track record of success and brings to MIOX a strong network of professional and industry relationships.
